text.name: shop_overwrite_messageLeasingReady
text.text:
A complete user manual available in game help.
You can pick up your leased vehicle from the store.

text.name: shop_overwrite_messagePurchaseReady
text.text:
A complete user manual available in game help.
You can fetch your purchase at the store.

text.name: function_ltmasterbalerwrapper
text.text: Goweil LT Master - baler wrapper combination

text.name: function_silageAdditiveTank
text.text: Silage Additives is used to get higher resolution.

text.name: GLTM_TEMP_INFO
text.text: A complete user manual available in game help.

text.name: GLTM_TURNON_NOT_ALLOWED_UNFOLD
text.text: Set machinery in work position first!

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_00_00
text.text: The LT-Master is THE baler-wrapper combination for round bales. This is because it can turn almost any chopped material into perfectly pressed and wrapped round bales - whether it be maize chaff, grass, hay, silage, mixed feed, forage, straw, etc. The idea behind the development of the LT-Master was to both make silage maize easier to handle by pressing it into convenient round bales and make it useful also for smaller agricultural operations. Each bale forms a small unit that can be fed to the animals in a quick and simple fashion. Bales of silage maize are an excellent choice as they keep the quality of the feed exceptionally high by protecting it against secondary fermentation or post-heating after the feed was pressed into bales.

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_00_01
text.text: From the game side, wrapping straw, hay or woodchips it means protecting them from weather; wrapping manure allow a better storage and a more value.

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_01_01
text.text: Folded: mm 11550 x 2550 x 4000 - Work position: mm 13940 x 5200 x 4010

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_02_00
text.text: Position tractor and machine on plain terrain and turn little bit to the left, then you can put machine in work position with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA2;

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_02_01
text.text: Go down to machine, open right door with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA2; to access control panel, put down support with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA4; and unfold with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA;

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_02_03
text.text: Now you can go on tractor and turn on machine with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA; , now with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA4; it's possible to turn off/on wrapper and with $input_IMPLEMENT_EXTRA2; it's possible to set desidered bale density.

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_02_04
text.text: Icon on hud: wrapper on/off - Net status - Foil Status - Bale chamber fill

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_03_00
text.text: You needs to refill the baler station with net, wrap foil and additive which can be purchased in the shop.

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_03_01
text.text: Net and wrap foil always needful, additive is not mandatory, will useful for a better yeld with chaff and grass.

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_03_02
text.text: Pallet of consumable can be used one by one to refill machine with $input_ACTIVATE_OBJECT;

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_04_00
text.text: This mod add two useful things:

text.name: GLTM_HL_TEXT_04_01
text.text: On the foot you can see information about any bales around, and with $input_ACTIVATE_OBJECT; you can unpack the bale and tip material to ground
